about_the_game:
This Supporter Pack includes exclusive Golden skin for the Gatekeepers:



And full game's OST, written by Ilya Nasyrov:
1. Aspect
2. Heart of Time
3. Following the Chaos
4. Temple of Arcanum
5. Whisper
6. Ethereal Bridge
7. Palium Child
8. Through the Horde
9. Equilibrium
10. Oasis
11. Origin Unknown
12. Void Empire
13. Superiority
14. Deadrunner
15. Riftmaker
16. Sentinel Unit
17. Abyss Wanderer
18. Calamity's Pact
19. Gatekeeper Main Theme

Thank you for the additional support for the developers! 🌟
detailed_description:
This Supporter Pack includes exclusive Golden skin for the Gatekeepers:



And full game's OST, written by Ilya Nasyrov:
1. Aspect
2. Heart of Time
3. Following the Chaos

name: Gatekeeper - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Complete soundtrack of Gatekeeper and an exclusive skin for playable characters.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
